item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @New-rune New-rune
item.description:
@New-rune wrote:

If i add this case case 2484:
if (actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“U craft Runes”);
setAnimation(811);
addSkillXP((500playerLevel[0]), 7);
addSkillXP((500playerLevel[3]), 7);
addItem(995, 100000);
addItem(544, 100);
addItem(555, 100);
addItem(556, 100);
addItem(557, 100);
addItem(558, 100);
addItem(560, 100);
addItem(561, 100);
addItem(563, 100);
addItem(562, 100);
addItem(565, 100);
actionTimer = 12;
}
break;

Will that make mebe able to use a cosmic atler and get those runes or do i gotta add something else?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2007, 12:02:50 PM[/size][hr]Can someone please help?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2007, 12:11:21 PM[/size][hr]Can someone help? anyone
